website_summaries.verdict: Portability gives this workbench an edge, as tough casters mean you can roll the bench anywhere.
pros: Uses a 1.5-inch solid wood table top to provide stability
Each of the 4 legs has a caster wheel so you can roll the workbench anywhere it's needed
2 of the wheels lock in place when you need a stationary unit
Steel frame of the workbench will hold up over time
cons: Table top isn't thick enough for heavy-duty workbench needs

customer_reviews.title: Lighter than it looks, top is solid but finish thin.
customer_reviews.text: I generally like it. The labeling of the parts and instructions were very good. Paint quality of black powder coat is very good. Despite how it looks, I was surprised the legs and back are made if very thin steel, if you were to collide with another lower cart, it would probably bend them. My crossbar bent already just trying to get it on it's wheels. The drawer liner stank so much I could not use it indoors. The top is nice solid rubberwood, but the finish is very thin so that it would not hold up well to heavy duty. Mine also has a repaired knot on it that really stands out, that should not have passed QA.
customer_reviews.author: TallGuy223

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money. And good looking.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Let me start by saying how easy this was to put together with very clear instructions, well marked pieces and a screwdriver included. Everything about the table is impressive; sturdy, metal legs and drawer, solid hardware and beautiful piece of wood. We are using the table in our kitchen as we like an industrial look yet it is understated-industrial, so it works in kitchens. Or pretty much anywhere you need a work table. It's too pretty to put in a garage. Only slight critique would be to have 4 locking wheels, not 2. Having said that we are still very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: A Nuclear Family

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table
customer_reviews.text: I make jewelry and this is the basis of my jeweler's bench - perfect height, VERY solidly made, attractive, sturdy. Excellent table! Took less than an hour to put together and seriously - it looks great. Has a solid wood butcher top - wheels are nice a big so, if you need to move it, it moves easily. And the wheels have great locks on them so, if you DON'T want it to move, it stays put. And no, I am not a bot being paid to give a good review. This is a really nice piece at a reasonable price. Rick
customer_reviews.author: Richard Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great table highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table. Putting it together took about 30. It was easy to put together. Very well thought out. If you find yourself struggling to fit parts together check the instructions, you are probably doing something wrong. It comes with the tools needed to put it together and comes with extra hardware just in case you loose one. I am using for a larg heat press that is like 80lb, and it's totally stable. Also it's bigger than it looks in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great for Classroom Setting
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my agricultural classroom, I love the fact that they are on wheels so I can roll them around my room without scratching the wax, the drawers are perfect for allowing students to store textbooks or folders or to put lab materials in. They are made for a 24 inch stool and they are really reasonably priced. My only complaint is that the top seems to be easily scratch-able and some of the corners were lightly damaged when we took them out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Agans

customer_reviews.title: More sturdy than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The delivered box weighed a ton. That was my first clue. Took a good 15-20 minutes just unpacking and confirming the parts. This work bench is nicer and stronger than I ever expected for the under #200 price. I'm probably a 3 out 5 on a scale for DYI folks. The actual assembly took an hour, by myself. The only real problem I had (other than man-handling this heavy baby) was getting the drawer onto the sldies at the end of assembly. The booklet doesnt really explain that aspect. A quick call to the manufacturer and bingo, assembly completed. Wheels work great, beech-wood top is thick and heavy, and the frame has some beef to it. Overall, excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 007Magnum

customer_reviews.title: Much higher quality than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This mobile work bench is fantastic in all aspects including design and engineering, choice of materials and ease of assembly. Assembly instructions were more than adequate as well. The only "glitch" I encountered was that I installed the drawer bottom upside down first time around and was unable to properly install the front of the drawer. After discovering and correcting my error, final assembly went quite well. The only suggestion I could offer is that, because not all concrete floors are completely level, a way to level one or two of the casters would be nice to compensate. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Sky

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this workbench/cart - Great for a Craftroom too!
customer_reviews.text: Recieved it faster than I thought and put it together without a problem. The instructions were clear, the screws were in separate little baggies with a number on the bag, big and easy to read. I put it together all by myself, just needed my son to help me flip it when I was done with the legs - it's pretty heavy. Very sturdy, real wood top, the drawer can be setup into 3 compartments but I left it one flat drawer for the large photo and presentation paper I use with my large Epson printer. It is in my office/craft room, I am extremely happy with it and feel it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sikora

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This is very solid, has great build quality and has BETTER directions that a certain Swedish powerhouse. The instructions are well thought out, clear and pretty easy to follow. Including the magnetic screwdriver is a nice touch as not everyone has one and it's just the right tool for parts of the assembly. A pleasure to build and a joy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Edo Deshi

customer_reviews.title: Not What I expected
customer_reviews.text: Carton Arrived on time and was excited to get the table assembled. Opened the box and disappointment settle right in. The top has scratches and dents on it. Then assembly time. Instructions poorly written and the drawer will not go onto the drawer slides no matter how hard I tried. Would return, but the packaging was trash from the delivery. Update: Found the issue with the drawer. The slides on the drawer are to small to allow the drawer slides to go into the drawer. DON't BUY!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Quality you seldom find
customer_reviews.text: Everything in this workbench was top quality. The hardwood top was almost too pretty to use. The metal parts were all heavy-gauge metal. Instructions were good and problem free. There were plenty of screws and even a small bag of extras. Locking, rolling wheels were a good 2" wide and large enough to roll around a shop without much effort. The legs were welded metal with thick side supports provided stability. It even included a strong steel drawer that looked like it could hold everything you could find in a DIY shop...You can't go wrong with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Public

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with great drawer space!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this work bench for my classroom. I wanted something that was y’all so I could stand, but that still had drawers. This desk is perfect. The picture of the drawer doesn’t do it justice. The drawer is huge! I’m also always skeptical of buying furniture online without seeing it, but the quality is amazing! This is such a sturdy desk you definitely won’t have to worry about it falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Maurisa

customer_reviews.title: Nicely engineered product
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived in excellent condition except for a couple of slightly bent drawer panel metal flanges. These "blemishes" were minor and were easily repaired with a pliers. The assembly was easy and without any problems except when it came to putting the drawer together. The instructions were explanatory and easy to follow. This is the second one of these tables that I have purchased so I had one to compare to while assembling the second one. For some reason the front drawer panel was missing 4 screw holes as shown in the instructions. I confirmed this when I checked the drawer of my first table. Despite this omission, the draw is still sturdy and functions normally.
customer_reviews.author: Selpan

customer_reviews.title: This desk is a beast
customer_reviews.text: Although this is a garage work desk, I used it for a bar height office desk. It's very well made. the butcher block top is a nice piece of solid laminated wood. The metal drawers fit well and are fairly sturdy. The only downside of using it as an office desk is that the wires show from beneath the desk. I plan on adding a panel to the back to solve that problem. The drawers were a little confusing to assemble but went together well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Great work bench for a smaller space
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, easy to assemble workbench. The top is solid wood with a nice finish. I would have preferred a matte finish, since it's already getting scratched up, but it's good enough. The metal is fairly thin but heavy enough gauge to withstand normal residential use. The drawer slides smoothly and comes with a non-stick pad for tools. The packaging was just OK, but there was one small gouge on the surface of the wooden top. Not enough to complain about because it's a workbench, but they could definitely improve.
customer_reviews.author: JayP

customer_reviews.title: High quality work bench, perfdct as a standing desk
customer_reviews.text: I’m working from home now, and wanted a sturdy stand up desk. I was skeptical ordering this online, but it arrived with no damage, and is very high quality. My husband put it together yesterday, and mentioned the instructions were a little confusing (he is a whiz at building IKEA furniture, so it means something if he had to re-do some steps), but once put together it is rock solid and looks amazing in my home office. Exactly what I was looking for, definitely worth the money. My husband might order one for his office.
customer_reviews.author: P. Winn

customer_reviews.title: Home Office Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This table is absolutely a must if you’re looking to enhance or create a home office. The table is so sturdy and beautiful modern design. The casters make this a fully functional table that is portable. I highly recommend this table for either your garage or home office. The drawer has two dividers and offers ample space for files and tech needs. Buy it today!
customer_reviews.author: QUE

customer_reviews.title: Nice for computer desk
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this bench as a computer desk in a corner of my bedroom. I’m 6 ft 6 in tall, so I like my desk being tall also. This desk is well built, sturdy, looks nice, and has a nice finish on the desktop. See from my photo how I mounted a shelf toward the back of the desk to elevate my monitor and speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Decent For The Price But Beware Of Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be good for the money. One issue that I have run into is that it was missing two of the casters when I opened the box. It has been around three weeks and I have not received replacements from the manufacturer. You would think that warranty work would be a higher priority but it appears that is not the case. It is hard to justify using the bench if I am going to have to unload it to put the casters on.
customer_reviews.author: Edouard Stringer

customer_reviews.title: Great Workbench!
customer_reviews.text: In my professional career as a Building Engineer in a large trauma center, I have put hundreds of equipment kits together. This is the first one that had all the screw holes line up and included all the necessary parts. It’s very well designed and engineered with quality parts. It’s a tremendous addition to my home workshop. It’s well worth every cent! Thank you for building an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Looks good & feels solid
customer_reviews.text: It's recommended that you have someone assist you in building this, but it's not hard to assemble alone, as long as you take your time. The casters are bigger than on anything else I've got in my garage, but that just makes it feel more solid, while very easy to move, even once loaded up.
customer_reviews.author: T. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice product arrived damaged because of packing
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the product is good, but there are two problems. First, the packaging was not strong enough, and it arrived with a hole in the side of the box. The wooden top under that hole is gouged in several places. This marred top is not enough to send a worktable back, but it was a disappointment. Second, the assembly instructions are not very clear and the drawings are so small that the instructions become ambiguous. We got it together, but with some difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: PortiaNJ

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY WORKBENCH
customer_reviews.text: We've been assembling lots of storage pieces for our garage recently - but this workbench has by far, been the best piece we've seen. (My husband made it clear he wanted to leave a nice review for this workbench.) Sturdy, nice looking and easy to assemble. Directions are clear and concise. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Suburbanstylista

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as-is
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb piece of furniture. The assmbly instructions were, for a change, perfect! The box even included a box wrench and magnetic screwdriver. I put it together by myself in about an hour. It weighs 60+ pounds, so if you're not very big, you'll want help standing it rightside up when your done (you have to build it top down). I am tall, so it's not high enough to be a standing desk, but if you're less than 5'8" you could use it that way. I am looking for a good drafting chair, right now sitting on my usual office chair, with a stack of cushions.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Barton

customer_reviews.title: Would buy another one
customer_reviews.text: 4 months later and I still love this thing. I'm not afraid to put my (considerable) weight into it. The drawer is large and will hold 50 lbs as I recall. Assembly was straightforward. Wish I had a helper, the top is heavy. The bench is high enough for a 6' 2" person to work at standing. The casters are large enough to roll on carpet and solid. I would - and just may - buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Tee

customer_reviews.title: Extremely useful workbench
customer_reviews.text: I use this movable workbench frequently and have become fond of its features. It's sturdy, and the wood surface is non-conductive (I use it for my electronics projects). I recommend it to anyone who needs a portable workbench. It's wide casters protect wood floors, won't leave wheel marks, dents in the surface, (assuming your projects don't weigh a ton).
customer_reviews.author: John I.

customer_reviews.title: Seriously? No pieces missing or bent?  YES!
customer_reviews.text: A pleasant surprise. Extra pieces left over, didn't have to get the drill out to fix holes, excellent quality, sturdy, no bent pieces... I'm stunned in a good way. I'm a 62 year old woman with rheumatoid arthritis and I put this together alone. The top was incredibly heavy but it's a solid block of butcher block style wood, not press board or plywood. Very pleased. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rocksister

customer_reviews.title: Workbench height not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting into manufacturing, and I feel like this workbench can be an ideal equipment to help you get most jobs done. I think I rate it as a medium-duty workbench (not a heavy-duty workbench). It would be nice if the height is adjustable since I think most people would want to mount a vise on it (lower table top for better leverage). Other than the height issue, it's a very solid medium-duty for tight aparment units or studio (which is what I have) for getting things done and for building most automotive prototypes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: AzongLee

customer_reviews.title: Best ever for ease of assembly!
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and assembled it mostly alone in 3 hours. It's the best piece of furniture I've ever assembled as to accuracy of hole alignment, all necessary parts, and a most useful magnetic screwdriver. The only help I needed when was turning it upright midway through the assembly; it is pretty heavy for one person. I think this is going to be super!
customer_reviews.author: N. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Jack of all trades
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Roles really well. Very sturdy. Obviously assembly sucks but it’s not difficult. Honestly who just loves assembling things. Drawers pull out smoothly. The height is perfect. We use this for anything from sorting mail, to puzzle station, to even a make shift baby changing station once or twice!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: A great work bench
customer_reviews.text: The product had great reviews, and they were accurate. Yes, it may be a bit more than what I wanted to spend for four legs and a 24x48 work surface, but it is great quality and the height is perfect. Delivery was better than expected. The quoted Tuesday and I received it the Friday before. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chef_Paco

customer_reviews.title: Drawer doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 70 year old female not that it should matter. I paid someone to put it together. He has put things together for me with no problem. The drawer will not go in. I’m really disappointed. I’m working on a dollhouse which fits it perfectly and I wanted my tools in the drawer. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: S. Collier

customer_reviews.title: Super Workbench and it ROLLS (but has brakes!). Quality from top to bottom.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worked for decades on workbenches and have never, ever seen one as sturdy as this one ! Even the packaging was superb. Included were a magnetic screwdriver (HUGE help with all the screws) and a wrench for the bolts. Instructions were clear. The work surface is 1 1/2” thick hardwood; you could overhaul a big V-8 on this thing. Wheel brakes are provided to keep the table stable. The 4-ft-wide metal drawer opens with one finger (nice drawer slides) and comes with dividers and a rubber mat to keep your tools steady. Overall, it looks great and is very nicely finished. Hands-down, it’s the most stable, best engineered work bench on wheels EVER.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Roylance

customer_reviews.title: Great Workbench
customer_reviews.text: I bought this workbench for my craftroom and absolutely love it. It is large and sturdy enough for my heat press with extra room to work if needed as well. I will be purchasing another one as my workspace also. When the package arrived I was missing two of my wheels. I contacted Seville via email and received a response immediately and they shipped out my missing parts and received in the time frame they told me. Great company customer service and product. Will definitely be purchasing another one for my craft space.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Pliskat

customer_reviews.title: Love This Workbench!
customer_reviews.text: My workbench arrived quickly and it was well packaged. All parts were included, even extra screws, a magnetic screwdriver and a wrench. The directions were very clear and all parts were labeled clearly. This went together like a breeze! I’m a 69 year old female and put this together in a few hours by myself. The wood top is a really heavy beautiful piece of wood! The caster wheels are very heavy duty. This is a great addition to my garage! I love this workbench and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Artist

customer_reviews.title: It came packed with care and everything was in perfect condition. All parts were present and labeled
customer_reviews.text: First this was more than I wanted to spend. I just wanted something to work on, no heavy duty projects. This table is solid as a rock. It came packed with care and everything was in perfect condition. All parts were present and labeled. If you just "follow directions" its a snap to put together. If your looking for strong / solid, quality table this is it. The wheels are a big plus to be able to work where you want. Buy it with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bench!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome high quality bench . . . the best I've seen! I mounted a small portable table saw, a drill press and 4" belt sander to the top and roll it outside my garage to use to help keep the garage clean. I've put tons of products together and this was the easiest and best that I have ever completed. The top is beautiful, drawer works great, is very large and useful and the wheels are large, work well and brake well. Top notch product I would give ten stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: LRD

customer_reviews.title: Solid, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I don't do a lot of reviews, but this workbench is such a good deal I had to leave one. Extremely solid, heavy butcher block wood mounted on nicely powdercoated, solid metal frame. The holes all lined up and the hardware wasn't cheap (did not strip or cross-thread). I am incredibly happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: EASY to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench. I got it to put a bird cage and fish tank on it while leaving dog crate storage underneath. I am an older female, not one that likes product directions for assembly, and was able to put it together easily. The directions where spot on and everything I needed in the box. It is perfect for my needs. I am considering another for the other dog crate.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Hardison

customer_reviews.title: Much Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This workbench is very sturdy with quality hardware. The assembly instructions are excellent, all pieces clearly marked, and no missing screws. Everything fit well together. It took me about an hour to assemble everything. I highly recommend this work bench.
customer_reviews.author: SJH

customer_reviews.title: If could give 10 stars I would!
customer_reviews.text: If could give 10 stars I would! This work table is fantastic! The material is extremely high quality. The wood is a solid, real piece of wood. This is NOT compressed wood, this is real, nice solid wood. The quality and finish is very, very high. The process to put together the table took approximately 45 minutes of that long, maybe less. Extremely satisfied and ordering an other product from Seville through Amazon. Extremely happy customer here.
customer_reviews.author: joseinAhwatukee

customer_reviews.title: This is a rare 5-Star !!!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely impressed by the quality of this bench! It is well made and heavy duty, and priced very well. I am thinking about buying a second bench for my workshop. I have 5 other items from the Seville Series and they are all very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality. You can tell it's made well because everything fits together easily, and each step of assembly was thought out. Put this together by myself in about 30-40 mins. Very sturdy, instructions easy to follow, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific little workbench. I was impressed with the quality of the pieces and design. The instructions were clear (except for the very last page on attaching the drawer) and they even included a wrench and a screwdriver. It took about 2 hours to assemble because there are many screws, but it is clearly designed to be sturdy. The casters are a good larger size and the top is solid and well finished. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: junk

customer_reviews.title: Decent Materials, Fit and Finish
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a good purchase. The wood top is nice and smooth as well as attractive. It is tall enough to stand at, or if you have a tall stool, to sit at. The drawer works smoothly. I zip tied a power strip to one of the side beams. I put it together in a few hours, tools are included but I augmented a few steps with my own. Nice big casters that roll on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: NoVAgirl

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Quality Made
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, heavy and quality made. Love this garage work table!
customer_reviews.author: jamiejones75

customer_reviews.title: Amazing workbench!
customer_reviews.text: I was originally apprehensive to get workbench with wheels but decided it might make it more usable in different areas of garage, and I was right. It easily rolls to wherever I need a bench surface to work. I also like wood top and thick medal legs. I feel this workbench will last as long as I need it. I’m actually considering getting a second one without wheels for those longer term projects.
customer_reviews.author: Toml

customer_reviews.title: Solid desk
customer_reviews.text: Awesome desk. Easy to setup. I bought the desk only. No back drop pegboard. Very sturdy and solid. My only nitpick is I would have like the option for no wheels but thick rubber on the botttom instead. Wheel locks are just ok. Desk is solid though. Wood top is thick and solid. I think I can put a vise on it.
customer_reviews.author: Trojansky

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty bench especially the wood top. Assembly was relatively easy, but the drawer pictures should be a close up zoom in picture. All pieces line up correctly. Well worth the money, just what I needed. Mobility so I can move it under my shelving during non use. No missing hardware but they give you extras in case it is needed. Drawer dividers are useful.
customer_reviews.author: bavaria e3

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy table with a nice wood top. The casters are very hefty. Instructions were fair to follow, however the stickers on the stands and drawer made it easy to align when putting it together. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KWilson

customer_reviews.title: A bit costly but excellent !
customer_reviews.text: The workbench came right on time it was very easy to assemble it’s made of good quality wood and good quality metal. The wheels are great, role very easily and lock in place. I wish it was a bit cheaper but all in all I can’t complain I am very satisfied .
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, heavy duty, multi-purpose
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, heavy duty work bench. We are ordering a second one to use as a desk in the office. We wanted a tall, mobile desk and the casters on this thing are incredible. We definitely needed the 2 of us to put it together. It wasn’t too difficult, but I hate picture instructions, so bits of it took some time. We probably had it together in about 90 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very good .... BUT
customer_reviews.text: Top is solid and heavy duty. Over all this bench is quite good for the money, easy to assemble and good casters. I took away one star because the tubing is pretty thin. If the legs were a little bit more rugged I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: It's Only Me

customer_reviews.title: Great Product you have two thumbs up I give you 10 but olny have two
customer_reviews.text: I looked for tables and this is above and beyond. I ordered two or three days ago it said it was comming on monday the smile on my face to see it three days early PRICELESS you guys rock great product if you had a web sight it would be nice to see what else you have. THANKS Mike
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: came packed very well. some holes and dents on box, but well protected. wood is solid quality with a decent varnish. easy to put together. no missing parts. shockingly good quality. drawer sildes nicely. table is tall. comes with tools. for the price, you can't go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing--bench useless
customer_reviews.text: The product was supposed to have a damaged box--that was ok with me, but instead the box was damaged and there was no directions, no screws ,no bolts , no washers, no wheels, so the bench could not be assembled and was worthless. Needless to say, I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: marvin trimas

customer_reviews.title: Defective threaded parts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a total of 4 of these benches. 3 arrived in good shape, no problem to assemble. The 4th arrived with grossly defective threaded parts, making it impossible to assemble the bench. 25% failure rate is quite high for a factory.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: SOLID!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little intimidated at first after unboxing it. I finally decided to assemble the drawer first; it took about an hour, but was not difficult. After that, everything was a breeze. It was very logical. All the parts are clearly labeled. Very solid, attractive bench.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Product is defective
customer_reviews.text: Multiple times contacting company to no availe. Product is great, drawer does not fit. Guiders are not conducive to design. Staff was unhelpful. Would not recommend this company. Thumbs down
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, same quality as benches worth twice as much
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry I spent more money that was necessary for mobile, maple-top tables in my lab, later on a coworker found this table and I would have used all of these given the opportunity. Quality is great on bench top, frame and drawer. Looking to Seville first next time!
customer_reviews.author: Jolls

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This workbench arrived excellently packaged for protection of the pieces. There was not a single scracthed or bent part. I was also impressed that all of the parts fit together without having to reem out any holes or debur any threads. It comes with all necessary tools (screwdriver & wrench) for assembly (no more than 30 minutes and no hassle involved). The build materials were heavy enough to form a very solid workbench once assembled. I drilled holes in the top and mouted a bench vice on the front corner and the thick solid wood top and square leg metal frame are more than sturdy enough for such an application.
customer_reviews.author: Indigoz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy attractive desk but it is very high.. just be aware
customer_reviews.text: It’s a sturdy great looking desk, just be aware it is “high” and a standard chair will definitely not work. You need a work stool. I bought this as my main desk and it’s a bit high but ok for standing or with a stool.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Z.

customer_reviews.title: he's pretty handy that way anyway
customer_reviews.text: I bought this work bench for my husband for Christmas. He had been looking for one for a while and when he found this one on Amazon and after reading some reviews, he decided on this.He put it together rather quickly, he said it was not difficult, and set it up in our garage. It is very good quality, solid wood table, and he is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Best work table I have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely Sturdy and Solid. Rolls good great wheels. Good drawer holds all the tools i need. Good work surface. was very easy to put together, instructions were dead on and took me 40 minutes by myself. really couldn't ask for a better work table.
customer_reviews.author: Russell T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, weak assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to putting this workbench together. No missing parts, everything was correctly labeled, but the pictures in the assembly instructions could've been much clearer, e.g. the drawer assembly should have shown the proper placement of the front and back panels in more detail. Other than that, it's a great product, exactly what I wanted and expected.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very well built and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I was shopping around for a studio table for the longest time, cost was a major concern, this table well exceeds what I have seen and the cost is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty easy to assemble. They recommend two people but I was able to do it by myself. The top is pretty heavy and sturdy, which is nice, but also why two people are suggested. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Yasment

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a solid and stable bench!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many others - they all let me down. This bench stays still, is solid, is a perfect height for what I need, and looks good too. Assembly was easy. Was setup and using it in less that 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: crasagam

customer_reviews.title: Great bench at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Solid bench, went together easily and had great instructions. If I were to note one problem it is that the cross support bar for the back two legs is surface mounted on the back of the two legs so you can push the bench top flush to the wall. Not a huge issue though.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best assemble-by-customer workbench ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best assemble-yourself item I have ever purchased (and I have bought many over the years). Simple instructions, simple assembly and everything fits together easily. While they say you need two people to put it together, in actual fact, you need only one and then maybe someone to help you flip it upright. I highly recommend (and this is my first Amazon review after being a customer since the days when they just sold books!)
customer_reviews.author: Philip M. Rosoff

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!  I USE IT FOR MY GLOWFORGE!  Its the PERFECT SIZE!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my Glowforge Laser Printer. I love how sturdy it is. Being a girl it was easy to assemble also. The drawers are nice. Would buy again if I needed another one. Highly recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Blazek

customer_reviews.title: Solid workbench
customer_reviews.text: This workbench is how I wish most assemble-it-yourself furniture was like. The directions were clear, all the holes aligned well and everything went together easily. The workbench is really solid, and looks very durable.
customer_reviews.author: S. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bench suitable for any number of tasks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bench for use as a reloading station. The only drawback was I had to mount the reloading presses on the far ends of he bench to allow access to the drawer. Assembly was straightforward. The only problem encountered was one of the casters wanted to cross thread. This seems common in threaded inserts so it might be useful to have a tap or thread chaser on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Marr

customer_reviews.title: Well built table
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend, he loves it. Sturdy, heavy wood surface for tough jobs. Did take him a while to put together but it was worth the time. Like that there are drawers for tools we use all the time like screwdrivers, hammers, nails, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great product, exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice and is exactly what we needed. We have a small one car garage and this is perfect for a workbench that doesn't take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: little

customer_reviews.title: Strong & versitile
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table for wherever you need it. Sturdy, great benchtop, and protable too.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rascal

customer_reviews.title: Great workbench!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this workbench. I bought it to put my embroidery machine on. It is very sturdy and it was assembled easily. Directions are very clear. This looks great and I can move it from room to room, depending on where I want to work. The drawer is spacious for various tools. My husband built a matching shelf out of beech to put across the bottom rails for my bins of thread and stabilizer. I couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn L. Kissner

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed work table.
customer_reviews.text: This worktable is well designed and sturdy with a great top. Thinking about another one for the garage. Easy assembly. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Heimbichner

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3D printing
customer_reviews.text: I needed a solid and sturdy bench top for my 3D printer and this was the perfect solution! I decided not to use the casters in order to increase stability of the bench. All in all, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Cali KJ

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: A wonderfully designed table. The tabletop is made from a rigid sheet of thick wood. The drawer is rigid and massive. The assembly of it was a breeze, even with one person. All the components in the assembly lined up so perfectly that I was about to hand spin all the bolts in before tightening.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Luzader

customer_reviews.title: Work Bench
customer_reviews.text: Nice work bench for the price. I didn't want to mess up the nice wood top so I bought a piece of fiber board to place on top when cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Mcclure

customer_reviews.title: Best one to buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything is perfect and very well made!!!! High quality at an unbelievably low price!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: A worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.text: This work bench arrived on schedule, was well packaged to protect the product, had easy to follow assembly instructions, contained all the necessary parts, including a long stem magnetic screwdriver and hand wrench for assembly. It looks terrific. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy, and all the bolt holes lined up perfectly
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I really didn't expect too much, but I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of the table top when it arrived. The table top is very well made, and I appreciate it being solid maple. The top is very flat with no indications of warping. Assembly was easy, and all the bolt holes lined up perfectly, which says a lot for Chinese QA/QC. Drawer slides in and out very smoothly, although could have done with higher quality slides, but as I'm using it inside as a work station for my 3D printer, I have no issues with it's operation. I may be buying another one for the garage.
customer_reviews.author: William Begg

customer_reviews.title: Very nice work table
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together. Top is very strong and looks nice. Easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: carl g lind

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy table got reduced price for open box and missing wheels but amazon made good and gave credit for inconvenience
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Great little workshop table
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but pay attention! It looks great. It's sturdy. Only problem is I want to keep it unmarred...
customer_reviews.author: EyeDocinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all...
customer_reviews.text: Nice work bench for what it is. Top is solid and better quality than I’d expected. Finish is easy to scratch but the price point is about spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Midwestern Problems

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Workbench
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality workbench. Takes awhile to assemble, but very nice quality and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: It is well put together with sturdy hardware. The only problem I have is it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty table that is well worth the money it cost. It is well put together with sturdy hardware. The only problem I have is it only came with one set of wheels. I have contacted the seller and now waiting for the wheels to arrive. As usual on an item like this the instructions are not well illustrated. When putting the drawer together insure the bulges that are across the back and front piece face the inside of the drawer. Also be sure to remove the plastic clips on the drawer pulls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Work bench
customer_reviews.text: What a great work bench very easy to put together very easy to read instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Juliea

customer_reviews.title: Workbench
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy work bench. I love the wood top and the drawer is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice value!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed! I needed a solid, sturdy but mobile work table for aircraft maintenance. This table and the tool drawer works perfect and for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: WileEScott

customer_reviews.title: Great Workbench at a Great Value, comes together quickly.
customer_reviews.text: This workbench is definitely HEAVY DUTY and will stand up to some serious projects. We put it together in two hours. Be sure to have a friend to help you do this.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love my table!! I am an artist and I really needed to work standing up!! Very sturdy, easy to move around!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Eugenia Ulivi

customer_reviews.title: Solid bench !
customer_reviews.text: Very solid bench, I do electronic work and have a very small workroom. This fits perfectly. I love it's height since I prefer to work standing.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Dondzila

customer_reviews.title: A great product. Top is hardwood and thick enough to hammer on... hard!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy as a rock. Mounted vise and tool rack, drawer is solid and has compartments. 2 hour or less assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Stephen Berger MD PS

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Went together easy. The top is good quality. Drawer works flawlessly. Sturdy. Perfect for my garage and light use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This table is great. High quality engendering and straight forward assembly. Just use a quality #2 philips rather than the one they supply.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Samaha

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy at good price
customer_reviews.text: Work table is sturdy and the drawer slides easily. It was easy to assemble, but read instructions carefully about front and back orientation. The top is very sturdy, but easily scratched. I would recommend this piece, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DHoward

product_meta.title: Seville Classics UltraGraphite Wood Top Workbench on Wheels with Sliding Organizer Drawer Table, 48", Satin Graphite
product_meta.description:
Style:Workbench| Color:Satin Graphite| Size:48"

This versatile and multi-functional Seville Classics UltraGraphite Wood Top Workbench on Wheels with Organizer Drawer is constructed from industrial-strength powder coated steel. This durable workbench features a 1.5-inch thick, polyurethane-coated, solid wood top and 3 inch casters (two lock). The steel drawer features two stainless steel handles, commercial-grade ball-bearing sliders, and two adjustable dividers with seven mounting positions. Partition the drawer into different width compartments and store up to 60 lbs. tools, parts and more. The workbench measures 24.7 inches deep by 48 inches wide by 37.4 inches high. This must have workbench is ideal for use in garages, warehouses, mailrooms, basements or workshops.

 * Solid wood top measures 1.5 inches thick
 * Polyurethane-coated work surface for enhanced durability
 * Single solid steel drawer with ball-bearing sliders and non-slip drawer liners
 * Three drawer dividers with 7 mounting points 
 * Steel frame in graphite finish
 * Includes four 3-inch casters, two of four lock
 * Ideal for use in garages, warehouses, mailrooms, basements or workshops

Specifications
Dimensions: 48" W x 24.7" D x 37.4" H
Weight capacity: 500 lbs., evenly distributed 
Weight: 83.6 lbs. 
Model #: WEB484

Limited 1-Year Manufacturer's Warranty
Seville Classics products are backed by a 1-year limited warranty unless otherwise specified. The warranty protects against original defects in material or workmanship under normal home or office use for the duration of the warranty period.
feature_bullets: SOLID-WOOD TOP - Work with confidence on a 1.5" thick solid wood surface finished in UltraDurable polyurethane. Designed for heavy-duty to accommodate power tools, mounts and clamps safely.
STEEL ORGANIZER DRAWER - Includes 2 adjustable dividers and 7 mounting points - create compartments that fit the way you work.
HEAVY-DUTY FRAME - Steel frame in a tough graphite finish
MOBILE WORKSTATION - Four 3" casters with steel hardware, 2 locking
MULTIPURPOSE USE - This workshop and garage essential workbench is ideal for commercial, home, garage or office use.

WORK FROM HOME READY - It's perfect for remote workers and freelancers looking to stay active and productive from the comfort of their home. Adjust from sit-to-stand with the push of a button for the ultimate ergonomic workspace.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,953 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars

The warranty protects against original defects in material or workmanship under normal home or office use for the duration of the warranty period.
